shortDescription: Helps you manage and automate Microsoft Entra product family resources programmatically
title: Microsoft Entra PowerShell Module
description: The Microsoft Entra PowerShell module is a a new high-quality and scenario-focused command-line tool that allows administrators to manage and automate Microsoft Entra product family resources programmatically. This includes efficiently managing users, groups, applications, service principals, policies, and more. The module builds upon and is part of the Microsoft Graph PowerShell SDK and is fully interoperable with all cmdlets in the Microsoft Graph PowerShell SDK, enabling you to perform complex operations with simple, well documented commands. The module also offers a backward compatibility option with the deprecated AzureAD Module to accelerate migration. Entra PowerShell supports PowerShell version 5.1 and version 7+.
